Question: TDK Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TDK Corporation

Product 1: InvenSense Smart Industrial IIM-42653
- 6-axis/3-axis gyroscope and 3-axis accelerometer-IMU
- Gyro-programmable digital output of ±4000 dps
- Accelerometer-programmable range

Product 2: ICM-42370-P
- 3-axis accelerometer for consumer applications
- Low noise performance
- Measurement range up to ±16 g

Product 3: ASIL C ready 3D HAL® sensors
- For Automotive and Industrial applications
- Stray-field robust

Additional Information:
- Advanced edge machine learning (ML) solution
- Showcasing over 30+ technology demonstrations and experiences at CES 202
Summary_cn:
TDK Corporation

产品1：InvenSense 智能工业 IIM-42653
- 6轴/3轴陀螺仪和3轴加速度计 - IMU
- 陀螺仪可编程数字输出范围为±4000 dps
- 加速度计可编程范围

产品2：ICM-42370-P
- 适用于消费类应用的3轴加速度计
- 低噪音性能
- 测量范围高达±16 g

产品3：ASIL C准备好的3D HAL®传感器
- 适用于汽车和工业应用
- 对杂散场具有强韧性

附加信息：
- 先进的边缘机器学习（ML）解决方案
- 在CES展会上展示了30多项技术演示和体验
